ygData.subject: Re: Now about 1hs vs. 2hs Re: Rangers and warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL *jingle* *jingle* No actually I dont regularly play with a magician friends, I just do a /who mag 10 50 and ask the magicians in my zone to summon them for
ygData.messageBody:
LOL

*jingle* *jingle*

No actually I dont regularly play with a magician friends, I just do a /who
mag 10 50 and ask the magicians in my zone to summon them for me. They cost
the magician nothing but time, and I always pay 1gp or so a bag (sometimes
more depending on my mood and how much money I have on me).

8 backpacks, hmmm. Try having full banded with 8 backpacks at 75 str. Not
pretty. I carry one backpack cause I know once that bag is full I WILL be
encumbered and it forces me to sell.

> ----------
> From: David Rogers[SMTP:derogers334@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 11:11 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Now about 1hs vs. 2hs Re: Rangers and
> warriors
>
> From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
> --- "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> wrote:
> > Two words for you - dimensional bags.
>
> Yeah, but you have to get them each time you log on,
> and that's *far* too much trouble for me. I can maybe
> see if if you regularly play with a Magician friend,
> but I don't.
>
> I like my 8 backpacks, IMO. Sure, I get encumbered
> sometimes after long sessions of hunting, but the
> jingling just makes me feel better... :P
>
> ===
> :D
